description: The calculated checksum for a single batch of rows.

binNumber.description: The bin number for this batch.

count.description: The total number of rows included in this range checksum.

checksum.description: The checksum result for this range.

minimumId.description: The ID of the minimum row in this checksum range (inclusive).

maximumId.description: The ID of the maximum row in this checksum range (inclusive).
